title: Help ?
body: for some reason whenever i click on my inventory it lags my league out makes the client disappear but im still online and the client is still up but just not there ?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a network issue that's having trouble maintaining a connection, which would result in lag like this or preventing assets from downloading.  As a first step, if you using any third party programs like overworlf or play.tv go ahead and disable it.  You can also use[ this guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)for steps on disabling unwanted programs.  Hopefully, this will get your issue resolved!
